meta.name: description
meta.content: List of publications of Massimo Lauria

page.p: This is the list of my papers. The copyright of the papers belongs to the publisher. All papers available on this page are preprints, are essentially equivalent to the published versions, and can be only downloaded for personal or academic purposes. Some of my articles are also indexed and stored at the following locations

ul.li: Digital Bibliography and Library Project (DBPL) (not very up to date)
